nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(cpuPercent) AS 'CPU used %' FROM SystemSample FACET hostname TIMESERIES auto
SELECT average(memoryUsedPercent) AS 'Memory used %' FROM SystemSample FACET hostname TIMESERIES auto
SELECT average(diskUsedPercent) as 'Storage used %' FROM StorageSample FACET hostname TIMESERIES auto
SELECT average(transmitBytesPerSecond) AS 'Transmit bytes per second', average(receiveBytesPerSecond) AS 'Receive bytes per second' FROM NetworkSample  TIMESERIES auto
SELECT latest(diskUsedPercent) as 'Used %' FROM StorageSample FACET hostname, device limit 20
SELECT average(loadAverageOneMinute) as '1 minute', average(loadAverageFiveMinute) AS '5 minutes', average(loadAverageFifteenMinute) AS '15 minutes' FROM SystemSample TIMESERIES auto
SELECT latest(cpuPercent) as 'CPU %', latest(threadCount) as 'Threads' FROM ProcessSample FACET hostname, processId, processDisplayName ORDER BY 'CPU %' asc LIMIT 100
SELECT average(`memoryFreeBytes`) FROM SystemSample FACET hostname TIMESERIES auto
SELECT average(`memoryUsedBytes`) FROM SystemSample FACET hostname TIMESERIES auto
SELECT average(`diskFreePercent`) FROM SystemSample FACET hostname TIMESERIES auto
SELECT average(`diskReadsPerSecond`) FROM SystemSample FACET hostname TIMESERIES auto
SELECT average(`diskWritesPerSecond`) FROM SystemSample FACET hostname TIMESERIES auto
SELECT average(`receiveBytesPerSecond`) FROM NetworkSample FACET hostname TIMESERIES auto
SELECT average(`receivePacketsPerSecond`) FROM NetworkSample FACET hostname TIMESERIES auto
SELECT average(`receiveDroppedPerSecond`) FROM SystemSample FACET hostname TIMESERIES auto
SELECT average(`transmitBytesPerSecond`) FROM NetworkSample FACET hostname TIMESERIES auto
SELECT average(`transmitPacketsPerSecond`) FROM NetworkSample FACET hostname TIMESERIES auto
SELECT average(`transmitDroppedPerSecond`) FROM SystemSample FACET hostname TIMESERIES auto
FROM Log SELECT hostname, message, timestamp where hostname IS NOT NULL ORDER BY timestamp desc limit 100
SELECT average(apm.service.overview.web) * 1000 FROM Metric where appName != '' FACET appName, segmentName LIMIT 20 TIMESERIES
SELECT apdex(apm.service.apdex) as 'App server', apdex(apm.service.apdex.user) as 'End user' FROM Metric WHERE appName != '' FACET appName LIMIT 20 TIMESERIES
SELECT rate(count(apm.service.transaction.duration), 1 minute) as 'Web throughput' FROM Metric WHERE appName != '' FACET appName LIMIT 20 TIMESERIES

SELECT filter((count(apm.service.error.count) / count(apm.service.transaction.duration)), where transactionType = 'Web') as 'Web errors', count(apm.service.error.count) / count(apm.service.transaction.duration) AS 'All errors' FROM Metric WHERE appName != '' FACET appName LIMIT 20 TIMESERIES

FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) as `Count`, percentage(count(*), where error is true) as `Error Rate`, average(totalTime) as 'Average', max(totalTime) as 'Slowest' FACET appName, name order by average(totalTime)
SELECT average(apm.service.transaction.duration) * 1000 as responseTime FROM Metric WHERE appName != '' FACET `host` LIMIT 20 TIMESERIES
SELECT rate(sum(apm.service.cpu.usertime.utilization), 1 second) * 100 as cpuUsage FROM Metric WHERE appName != '' FACET `host` LIMIT 20 TIMESERIES
SELECT rate(count(apm.service.transaction.duration), 1 minute) as throughput FROM Metric WHERE appName != '' FACET `host` LIMIT 20 TIMESERIES
SELECT average(apm.service.memory.physical) * rate(count(apm.service.instance.count), 1 minute) / 1000 as memoryUsage FROM Metric WHERE appName != '' FACET `host` LIMIT 20 TIMESERIES
SELECT count(apm.service.error.count) / count(apm.service.transaction.duration) as errorRate FROM Metric WHERE appName != '' FACET `host` LIMIT 20 TIMESERIES
FROM DistributedTraceSummary SELECT average(duration.ms) / 1000 as 'avg duration', max(duration.ms) / 1000 as 'max duration', count(*) FACET root.entity.name, root.span.name limit 50
FROM Span SELECT average(duration), max(duration), count(*), percentage(count(*), where error is true) as error FACET appName, name limit 50
SELECT count(*) FROM TransactionError WHERE (`error.expected` IS FALSE OR `error.expected` IS NULL) FACET `error.class`, `transactionUiName`, `error.message` LIMIT 5 TIMESERIES EXTRAPOLATE
SELECT count(apm.service.error.count) / count(apm.service.transaction.duration) as 'Error rate' FROM Metric WHERE appName != '' TIMESERIES EXTRAPOLATE
FROM TransactionError SELECT count(*) FACET error.class, transactionName
FROM TransactionError SELECT count(*) FACET appName, error.class, transactionName, request.uri, error.message, http.statusCode limit 50

widgets.title: [Transactions] Time consumed by top web transactions

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT rate(sum(apm.service.transaction.duration), 1 second) * 100 FROM Metric WHERE (appName != '') FACET transactionName, transactionType LIMIT 20 TIMESERIES EXTRAPOLATE
SELECT rate(count(apm.service.transaction.duration), 1 minute) as 'Web' FROM Metric WHERE appName != '' FACET appName, transactionType LIMIT 20 TIMESERIES

widgets.title: [Databases] Top 5 database operations by time consumed

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT sum(apm.service.datastore.operation.duration) * 1000 FROM Metric WHERE (appName != '') FACET `datastoreType`, `table`, `operation` LIMIT 5 TIMESERIES
SELECT average(apm.service.datastore.operation.duration) * 1000 FROM Metric WHERE (appName != '') FACET `datastoreType`, `table`, `operation` LIMIT 5 TIMESERIES
SELECT rate(count(apm.service.datastore.operation.duration), 1 minute) FROM Metric WHERE (appName != '') FACET appName, datastoreType LIMIT 10 TIMESERIES

widgets.title: [External services] Top external services by count

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(apm.service.external.host.duration) FROM Metric WHERE (appName != '') FACET external.host, appName LIMIT 20

widgets.title: [External services] Top external services by time consumed

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT sum(apm.service.external.host.duration) * 1000 FROM Metric WHERE (appName != '') FACET `external.host` LIMIT 5 TIMESERIES
SELECT rate(count(apm.service.transaction.external.duration), 1 minute) FROM Metric WHERE (appName != '') FACET appName, transactionType LIMIT 10 TIMESERIES
FROM Log SELECT service_name, message, hostname where trace.id is NOT NULL limit 50
SELECT percentile(largestContentfulPaint, 75) FROM PageViewTiming
SELECT percentile(firstInputDelay, 75) FROM PageViewTiming
SELECT percentile(cumulativeLayoutShift, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE (timingName = 'pageHide')
SELECT percentile(pageHide, 75), percentile(windowUnload, 75) FROM PageViewTiming
SELECT percentile(firstInteraction, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE (deviceType != 'Unknown') AND (firstInteraction < 300) FACET `deviceType` LIMIT 10

widgets.title: [Summary] Initial page load and route change

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT percentile(duration, 50) FROM BrowserInteraction WHERE (`mobileOptimized` IS NULL) AND (category IN ('Initial page load', 'Route change')) FACET CASES (WHERE category = 'Initial page load' AS 'Initial page load (Window load + AJAX)', WHERE category = 'Route change' AS 'Route change') TIMESERIES EXTRAPOLATE

SELECT percentile(timeToResponseStart, 50) AS 'Back end (Time to first byte)', percentile(duration-timeToResponseStart, 50) AS 'Front end (Window load + AJAX)' FROM BrowserInteraction WHERE (`mobileOptimized` IS NULL) TIMESERIES EXTRAPOLATE
SELECT percentile(firstInteraction, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE (firstInteraction < 300) FACET `userAgentName`, `userAgentVersion` LIMIT 10

SELECT percentile(firstPaint, 50), percentile(firstContentfulPaint, 50), percentile(largestContentfulPaint, 50), percentile(windowLoad, 50), percentile(firstInteraction, 50) FROM PageViewTiming TIMESERIES EXTRAPOLATE

widgets.title: [Summary] Longest first input delay by URL

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT percentile(firstInputDelay, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE (firstInteraction < 300) FACET `pageUrl` LIMIT 10

SELECT rate(count(*), 1 minute) FROM BrowserInteraction WHERE(`mobileOptimized` IS NULL) AND (category IN ('Initial page load', 'Route change')) FACET CASES (WHERE category = 'Initial page load' AS 'Initial page load', WHERE category = 'Route change' AS 'Route change') TIMESERIES EXTRAPOLATE

FROM Span SELECT average(duration.ms) / 1000 as 'avg duration', max(duration.ms) / 1000 as 'max duration', count(*), count(error.statusCode) as 'Error count', percentage(count(*), where error.statusCode IS NOT NULL) as 'error (%)' where newRelic.ingestPoint = 'browser.spans' FACET name limit 50
FROM PageView SELECT count(*) FACET pageUrl limit 20
FROM PageView SELECT average(duration) FACET pageUrl limit 20
FROM PageView SELECT rate(count(*), 1 minute) as 'throughput' FACET pageUrl

FROM PageView SELECT average(queueDuration) as 'Queue', average(webAppDuration) as 'Web Application', average(backendDuration) as 'Backend', average(networkDuration) as 'Network', average(dnsLookupDuration) as 'DnsLookup', average(domProcessingDuration) as 'Dom Processing', average(pageRenderingDuration) as 'Page Rendering', average(connectionSetupDuration) as 'Connection Setup', average(secureHandshakeDuration) as 'Secure Handshake' TIMESERIES

widgets.title: [Page views] Page load breakdown (SPA agent only)

nrqlQueries.query: FROM BrowserInteraction SELECT average(timeToFetchStart) AS 'Request queueing', average(timeToResponseStart) AS 'First byte', average(firstPaint) as 'First paint', average(firstContentfulPaint) as 'First contentful paint', average(timeToDomInteractive) as 'Time to Interactive', average(timeToDomContentLoadedEventEnd) AS 'DOM content loaded', average(timeToLoadEventEnd) AS 'Window load', average(duration) AS 'Window load + AJAX' WHERE category = 'Initial page load' TIMESERIES

SELECT average(timeToLastCallbackEnd) AS 'Callback time', average(timeToLoadEventStart) AS 'Response time' FROM AjaxRequest WHERE (deviceType = 'Desktop') AND (httpMethod = 'GET') FACET groupedRequestUrl LIMIT 20 TIMESERIES
SELECT rate(count(*), 1 minute) FROM AjaxRequest WHERE (deviceType = 'Desktop') AND (httpMethod = 'GET') FACET groupedRequestUrl LIMIT 20 TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM AjaxRequest WHERE (deviceType = 'Desktop') AND (httpMethod = 'GET') AND (httpResponseCode > 299) FACET groupedRequestUrl, httpResponseCode LIMIT 20 TIMESERIES
SELECT average(responseBodySize) AS 'Sent', average(requestBodySize) AS 'Received' FROM AjaxRequest WHERE (deviceType = 'Desktop') AND (httpMethod = 'GET') FACET groupedRequestUrl LIMIT 20 TIMESERIES
FROM PageView SELECT pageUrl, userAgentName, userAgentVersion, duration, timestamp order by duration desc limit 50
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError FACET userAgentOS, userAgentName, userAgentVersion, deviceType
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError FACET countryCode, city
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError FACET pageUrl, errorMessage, stackTrace, deviceType, userAgentName
SELECT rate(count(*), 1 minute) FROM PageView FACET deviceType, userAgentName EXTRAPOLATE
SELECT rate(count(*), 1 minute) FROM PageView FACET `userAgentName` TIMESERIES EXTRAPOLATE
select count(*) FROM PageView FACET deviceType
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView facet countryCode
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView facet countryCode, city

SELECT (1-filter(uniqueCount(uuid), WHERE category='Crash') / uniqueCount(uuid)) * 100 as `Crash-free users` FROM MobileSession, MobileCrash TIMESERIES LIMIT 20
SELECT percentage(uniqueCount(sessionId), WHERE category = 'Crash') as `Crash rate` FROM MobileSession, MobileCrash TIMESERIES LIMIT 20
FROM MobileCrash SELECT count(crashLocation) as 'Count' FACET appVersion, crashLocation limit 10
SELECT count(*) FROM MobileCrash FACET `crashLocation` TIMESERIES LIMIT 20
FROM MobileCrash SELECT appVersion as 'APP VERSION', crashLocation as 'LOCATION', crashMessage as 'MESSAGE', crashException as 'EXCEPTION', timeSinceLastInteraction as 'LAST' limit 50
SELECT percentage(uniqueCount(uuid), WHERE exceptionLocation IS NOT NULL) AS 'Users Affected' FROM  MobileSession, MobileHandledException TIMESERIES LIMIT 20
SELECT percentage(uniqueCount(sessionId), WHERE exceptionLocation IS NOT NULL)  AS 'Sessions Affected' FROM  MobileSession, MobileHandledException TIMESERIES LIMIT 20
SELECT count(*) FROM MobileHandledException FACET `exceptionLocation` TIMESERIES LIMIT 20
SELECT average(responseTime) FROM MobileRequest FACET `requestDomain` LIMIT 20

widgets.title: [HTTP requests] Top request domains by response time

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(responseTime) FROM MobileRequest FACET `requestDomain` TIMESERIES LIMIT 20

widgets.title: [HTTP requests] Percent of users experiencing response times > 0.5 seconds

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT percentage(uniqueCount(uuid), WHERE responseTime > 0.5)  AS 'Percent of users' FROM  MobileRequest, Mobile TIMESERIES

SELECT average(responseTime) as `Average response time`, percentile(responseTime, 99) as `99th percentile`, percentile(responseTime, 50) as `50th percentile`, percentile(responseTime, 1) as `1st percentile` FROM MobileRequest TIMESERIES

widgets.title: [HTTP requests] HTTP errors and network failures

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) FROM MobileRequestError FACET `errorType` TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM MobileRequestError FACET `requestDomain` LIMIT 20
SELECT percentage(count(*), where errorType is not null)  AS 'Errors and Failures Rate %' FROM  MobileRequestError, MobileRequest TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM MobileRequestError FACET `requestDomain` LIMIT 20 TIMESERIES
FROM MobileRequestError SELECT statusCode, responseBody, requestUrl, lastInteraction, carrier, asnOwner, asnOwner, networkError LIMIT 50

FROM Metric SELECT sum(getField(newrelic.timeslice.value, sumOfSquares)) as 'Network Failures', count(newrelic.timeslice.value) as 'HTTP errors'
WHERE appName != '' 
WITH METRIC_FORMAT 'Mobile/Carrier/{country}/ErrorRate'
FACET country
TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT average(kentik.snmp.CPU) FACET entity.name TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT average(kentik.snmp.MemoryUtilization) FACET entity.name TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT round((sum(kentik.snmp.ifInErrors)/sum(kentik.snmp.ifHCInOctets))*100,.01) AS 'RX Error Rate' TIMESERIES FACET if_interface_name OR if_Name
FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.IfInUtilization) AS 'RX Utilization' TIMESERIES FACET if_interface_name OR if_Name
FROM Metric SELECT round((sum(kentik.snmp.ifInDiscards)/sum(kentik.snmp.ifHCInOctets))*100,.01) AS 'RX Discard Rate' TIMESERIES FACET if_interface_name OR if_Name
FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.IfOutUtilization) AS 'TX Utilization' TIMESERIES FACET if_interface_name OR if_Name
FROM Metric SELECT round((sum(kentik.snmp.ifOutErrors)/sum(kentik.snmp.ifHCOutOctets))*100,.01) AS 'TX Error Rate' TIMESERIES FACET if_interface_name OR if_Name
FROM Metric SELECT round((sum(kentik.snmp.ifOutDiscards)/sum(kentik.snmp.ifHCOutOctets))*100,.01) AS 'TX Discard Rate' TIMESERIES FACET if_interface_name OR if_Name

FROM Metric SELECT round(latest(kentik.snmp.IfOutUtilization),.01) AS 'TX Utilization %', round((sum(kentik.snmp.ifOutErrors)/sum(kentik.snmp.ifHCOutOctets))*100,.01) AS 'TX Error Rate %', round((sum(kentik.snmp.ifOutDiscards)/sum(kentik.snmp.ifHCOutOctets))*100,.01) AS 'TX Discard Rate %', latest(if_Description) AS 'Description', latest(if_Address) AS 'Address', latest(if_PhysAddress) AS 'Phys Address', latest(if_Index) AS 'Index', latest(if_Alias) AS 'Alias' LIMIT 1000 FACET if_interface_name OR if_Name AS 'Name'

FROM KFlow SELECT latest(device_name), latest(Type or type) AS 'Flow Type', rate(count(*),1 second) AS 'Flows per Second', latest(timestamp) AS 'Last Update', uniqueCount(src_addr, dst_addr) AS 'Observed IP Addresses'
FROM KFlow SELECT sum(in_bytes * sample_rate) AS 'Rx Bytes', sum(out_bytes) AS 'Tx Bytes' TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM KFlow SELECT sum(in_pkts*sample_rate) AS 'Rx Packets', sum(out_pkts*sample_rate) AS 'Tx Packets' TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM KFlow SELECT uniqueCount(application) AS 'Applications' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'netflow-events' TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM KFlow SELECT sum(in_bytes * sample_rate) AS Bytes FACET application LIMIT 25
FROM KFlow SELECT sum(in_bytes * sample_rate) AS Bytes FACET application LIMIT 25 TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM KFlow SELECT uniqueCount(src_addr,dst_addr) AS Conversations WHERE instrumentation.name = 'netflow-events' TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM KFlow SELECT sum(in_bytes * sample_rate) AS Bytes FACET src_host or src_addr, dst_host or dst_addr LIMIT 25
FROM KFlow SELECT sum(in_bytes * sample_rate) AS Bytes FACET src_host or src_addr, dst_host or dst_addr LIMIT 25 TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM KFlow SELECT uniqueCount(src_addr) AS 'Sources' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'netflow-events' TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM KFlow SELECT sum(in_bytes * sample_rate) AS Bytes FACET src_host or src_addr LIMIT 25
FROM KFlow SELECT sum(in_bytes * sample_rate) AS Bytes FACET src_host or src_addr LIMIT 25 TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM KFlow SELECT uniqueCount(dst_addr) AS 'Destinations' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'netflow-events' TIMESERIES
FROM KFlow SELECT sum(in_bytes * sample_rate) AS Bytes FACET dst_host or dst_addr LIMIT 25
FROM KFlow SELECT sum(in_bytes * sample_rate) AS Bytes FACET dst_host or dst_addr LIMIT 25 TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM KFlow SELECT uniqueCount(src_geo, dst_geo) AS 'Geo Conversations'WHERE instrumentation.name = 'netflow-events' TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM KFlow SELECT sum(in_bytes * sample_rate) AS Bytes FACET src_geo, dst_geo LIMIT 25
FROM KFlow SELECT sum(in_bytes * sample_rate) AS Bytes FACET src_geo, dst_geo LIMIT 25 TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM KFlow SELECT uniqueCount(protocol) AS 'Protocols' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'netflow-events' TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM KFlow SELECT sum(in_bytes * sample_rate) AS Bytes FACET protocol LIMIT 25
FROM KFlow SELECT sum(in_bytes * sample_rate) AS Bytes FACET protocol LIMIT 25 TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM KFlow SELECT uniqueCount(src_as, dst_as) AS 'Autonomous System Conversations' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'netflow-events' TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM KFlow SELECT sum(in_bytes * sample_rate) AS Bytes FACET src_as_name, src_as, dst_as_name, dst_as LIMIT 25
FROM KFlow SELECT sum(in_bytes * sample_rate) AS Bytes FACET src_as_name, src_as, dst_as_name, dst_as LIMIT 25 TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM KFlow SELECT uniqueCount(dst_addr) AS 'Destination IPS', uniqueCount(l4_dst_port) AS 'Outbound Ports' FACET src_host or src_addr AS 'Source' LIMIT 25
FROM KFlow SELECT uniqueCount(dst_addr) FACET src_host or src_addr LIMIT 25 TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM KFlow SELECT uniqueCount(src_addr) AS 'Source IPS', uniqueCount(l4_dst_port) AS 'Incoming Ports' FACET dst_host or dst_addr AS 'Destination' LIMIT 25
FROM KFlow SELECT uniqueCount(src_addr) FACET dst_host or dst_addr LIMIT 25 TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM SyntheticCheck SELECT percentage(count(result), WHERE result = 'SUCCESS') as 'Success rate'
FROM SyntheticCheck SELECT filter(count(result), WHERE result != 'SUCCESS') as 'failed', count(result) as '/ checks'
SELECT average(durationSend) AS 'Send', average(durationWait) AS 'Wait', average(durationReceive) AS 'Receive' FROM SyntheticRequest TIMESERIES auto

SELECT average(durationBlocked + durationConnect + durationDNS + durationWait) as 'First Byte', average(firstPaint) as 'First Paint', average(firstContentfulPaint) as 'First Contentful Paint', average(onPageLoad) as 'Page Load' FROM SyntheticRequest WHERE isNavigationRoot is true  TIMESERIES auto
SELECT average(responseBodySize) FROM SyntheticRequest FACET contentCategory TIMESERIES auto

SELECT  average(durationBlocked) as 'Block', average(durationConnect) as 'Connect', average(durationDNS) AS 'DNS', average(durationSSL) as 'SSL', average(durationSend) as 'Send', average(durationWait) as 'Wait', average(durationReceive) as 'Receive'  FROM SyntheticRequest TIMESERIES auto
SELECT average(durationConnect) as 'Connect', average(durationDNS) AS 'DNS', average(durationSSL) as 'SSL' FROM SyntheticRequest TIMESERIES auto
SELECT count(*) FROM SyntheticRequest FACET domain TIMESERIES auto
SELECT average(responseBodySize) FROM SyntheticRequest TIMESERIES auto
SELECT count(*) AS 'Error response codes' FROM SyntheticRequest WHERE responseCode > 399  FACET responseCode TIMESERIES auto
SELECT average(duration) FROM SyntheticRequest FACET domain TIMESERIES auto
SELECT average(duration) FROM SyntheticCheck FACET locationLabel TIMESERIES auto
FROM SyntheticRequest SELECT URL, locationLabel, duration, responseCode, responseStatus, responseBodySize limit 100
FROM NrAiIncident SELECT count(*) WHERE event = 'open' TIMESERIES 5 minutes FACET priority
FROM NrAiIncident SELECT count(*) as 'Violations' WHERE event = 'open' FACET priority
FROM NrAiIncident SELECT histogram(durationSeconds / 60 as 'Duration in minutes',360,25) WHERE event = 'close'
FROM NrAiIncident SELECT count(*) as 'Violations' FACET cases(WHERE muted is true as 'Is muted', WHERE muted is false as 'Not muted')
FROM NrAiIncident SELECT count(*) as 'Incident' WHERE event = 'open' FACET policyName LIMIT 5
FROM NrAiIncident SELECT count(*) as 'Incident' WHERE event = 'open' FACET conditionName LIMIT 5
FROM NrAiIncident SELECT count(*) as 'Incident' WHERE event = 'open' FACET targetName LIMIT 5
FROM NrConsumption SELECT sum(GigabytesIngested) since 30 days ago
SELECT rate(sum(GigabytesIngested), 1 day) AS 'Daily average' FROM NrConsumption SINCE 30 days AGO
FROM NrUsage SELECT max(usage) WHERE productLine='FullStackObservability' and metric in ('FullUsers') FACET metric since 1 month ago
FROM NrMTDConsumption SELECT latest(CoreUsersBillable OR 0) as 'CoreUsers' since 1 month ago
FROM NrUsage SELECT max(usage) WHERE productLine='FullStackObservability' and metric in ('BasicUsers') FACET metric since 1 month ago
SELECT rate(sum(GigabytesIngested), 1 day) AS avgGbIngestTimeseries FROM NrConsumption WHERE productLine = 'DataPlatform' FACET usageMetric LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO SINCE 30 days AGO

SELECT rate(sum(GigabytesIngested), 1 day) AS 'Avg daily ingest (GB)', sum(GigabytesIngested) as 'Total (GB)' FROM NrConsumption WHERE productLine = 'DataPlatform' FACET usageMetric SINCE 30 days AGO limit 50

FROM NrConsumption 
SELECT filter(sum(GigabytesIngested), WHERE usageMetric = 'MetricsBytes') / sum(GigabytesIngested) * 100 AS 'Metrics %', 
filter(sum(GigabytesIngested), WHERE usageMetric = 'TracingBytes') / sum(GigabytesIngested) * 100 AS 'Tracing %',
filter(sum(GigabytesIngested), WHERE usageMetric = 'InfraProcessBytes') / sum(GigabytesIngested) * 100 AS 'Infrastructure processes %',
filter(sum(GigabytesIngested), WHERE usageMetric = 'LoggingBytes') / sum(GigabytesIngested) * 100 AS 'Logging %',
filter(sum(GigabytesIngested), WHERE usageMetric = 'InfraIntegrationBytes') / sum(GigabytesIngested) * 100 AS 'Infrastructure integrations %',
filter(sum(GigabytesIngested), WHERE usageMetric = 'ApmEventsBytes') / sum(GigabytesIngested) * 100 AS 'APM events %',
filter(sum(GigabytesIngested), WHERE usageMetric = 'PixieBytes') / sum(GigabytesIngested) * 100 AS 'Pixie events %',
filter(sum(GigabytesIngested), WHERE usageMetric = 'InfraHostBytes') / sum(GigabytesIngested) * 100 AS 'Infrastructure hosts %',
filter(sum(GigabytesIngested), WHERE usageMetric = 'NetworkMonitoringBytes') / sum(GigabytesIngested) * 100 AS 'Network Monitoring %',
filter(sum(GigabytesIngested), WHERE usageMetric = 'BrowserEventsBytes') / sum(GigabytesIngested) * 100 AS 'Browser events %',
filter(sum(GigabytesIngested), WHERE usageMetric = 'CustomEventsBytes') / sum(GigabytesIngested) * 100 AS 'Custom events %',
filter(sum(GigabytesIngested), WHERE usageMetric = 'ServerlessBytes') / sum(GigabytesIngested) * 100 AS 'Serverless %',
filter(sum(GigabytesIngested), WHERE usageMetric = 'MobileEventsBytes') / sum(GigabytesIngested) * 100 AS 'Mobile %'
WHERE productLine = 'DataPlatform' since 30 days ago
